Project PerCederberg.Grammatica.Runtime

Class Summary
Analyzer A parse tree analyzer.
DFAState An automaton state.
GrammaticaRE The Grammatica built-in regular expression handler.
LookAheadSet A token look-ahead set.
NFACharRangeTransition A character range match transition.
NFACharTransition A single character match transition.
NFADigitTransition The digit character set transition.
NFADotTransition The dot ('.') character set transition.
NFAEpsilonTransition The special epsilon transition.
NFAMatcher A token pattern matcher using a NFA for both string and regular expression tokens.
NFANonDigitTransition The non-digit character set transition.
NFANonWhitespaceTransition The non-whitespace character set transition.
NFANonWordTransition The non-word character set transition.
NFAState An NFA state.
NFAStateQueue An NFA state queue.
NFATransition An NFA state transition.
NFAWhitespaceTransition The whitespace character set transition.
NFAWordTransition The word character set transition.
Node An abstract parse tree node.
ParseException A parse exception.
Parser A base parser class.
ParserCreationException A parser creation exception.
ParserLogException A parser log exception.
Production A production node.
ProductionPattern A production pattern.
ProductionPatternAlternative A production pattern alternative.
ProductionPatternElement A production pattern element.
ReaderBuffer A character buffer that automatically reads from an input source stream when needed.
RecursiveDescentParser A recursive descent parser.
RegExpMatcher A token pattern matcher for complex regular expressions.
REHandler The regular expression handler base class.
StringDFAMatcher A token pattern matcher using a DFA for string tokens.
SystemRE The .
Token A token node.
Tokenizer A character stream tokenizer.
TokenMatch The token match status.
TokenMatcher A token pattern matcher.
TokenNFA A non-deterministic finite state automaton (NFA) for matching tokens.
TokenPattern A token pattern.
TokenRegExpParser A regular expression parser.
TokenStringDFA A deterministic finite state automaton for matching exact strings.
TransitionTree An automaton state transition tree.
